Structs/Document/ErrorObject.html#/id.abstract: A unique identifier for this particular occurrence of the problem

Structs/Document/ErrorObject.html#/title.name: title
Structs/Document/ErrorObject.html#/title.abstract: A short, human-readable summary of the problem that SHOULD NOT change from occurrence to occurrence of the problem, except for purposes of localization

Structs/Document/ErrorObject.html#/detai.name: detail
Structs/Document/ErrorObject.html#/detai.abstract: A human-readable explanation specific to this occurrence of the problem. Like title, this fieldâ€™s value can be localized

Structs/Document/ErrorObject.html#/sourc.name: source
Structs/Document/ErrorObject.html#/sourc.abstract: An object containing references to the source of the error
